definition[0]: a business that provides a particular service for people or organizations
definition[1]: an organization or department, especially within a government, that does a specific job
example[1]: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
definition[2]: a government department with a particular responsibility
definition[3]: a business that provides a particular service or provides information about other businesses and their products
example[4]: Association Marketing Inc, an insurance agency and brokerage company
definition[4]: a business that represents a company in a particular area and sells its products
